name: Gambler Dice Guy
description:
==STORY LINE==

Gambler Dice Guy was depressed, so he started gambling. He actually won $1 trillion dollars, but then, the Bad Cards wanted to steal the money.  He might also fight the boss, "Jia", if the developers wanted to sleep at 2 AM when they had school tomorrow.

You mustn't die or you'll become poor again D:

                                                     ==FIN==

You play as Gambler Dice Guy and battle the Bad Cards at the BLUE Casino.

Movement:

WASD

Roll the Dice - Left Mouse Click(Only every 10 Seconds)

The guns are:

1.Pistol

2.Uzi

3.Shotgun

4.Flamethrower

5.Rocket Launcher

6.Bozo Gun(1 M dmg)
